entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
